EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #2 - US - 2014.08.26.Email - Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our webinar: “Agile Testing – Toto, We’re Not in Kansas – One Company’s Journey to Quality”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Moving from Chaos to Quality
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Agile Testing – Toto, We’re Not in Kansas – One Company’s Journey to Quality.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference. Join us for the final webinar in our series:
Agile Testing Webinar #3
September 9, 2014
10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT (1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT)
Automate Agile Testing with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite
With Roman Zednik, Tricentis
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-3-us-2014-09-09.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> to register for Webinar #3.
Check out www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts> for recordings of this and other webinars. Thanks,
The Tricentis Webinar Team
Megan Maloney
QA Manager,
IT Solution Delivery
CFA Institute
Michael Eckhoff
Senior VP of
Worldwide Sales
Tricentis
